author: Chris
content: I have sailed past Montgomery a number of time in Thames Barges ans a variety of traditional craft in both dark and daylight the wreck is on all the charts she is marked with bell buoys, light at night with lights, visible markers abound around the wreck, keeping clear is quite compelling.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: Medway Port control used to be at Garrison Point just over a mile from the wreck. They have now relocated to Liverpool which they obviously consider to be a safe distance for viewing the big bang and are managing VTS remotely. Our new esteemed Prime Minister, when he was Mayor of London, wanted to build an airport on land to be reclaimed just upstream.
